name: My Little Teathre Go!
description:
School performances are cool, right? Try to organize your own as a teacher. Puppetry simulator forces you to know your students and give them correct orders.

Team:
Mateusz Wojtanowicz - code
Wojciech Oziębły - code
Mateusz Pater - code
Maria Chojnacka - graphics
Rafał Nagadowski - sounds
